system.description: This spell functions like disguise self, except that you can change the appearance of other people as well. You can make each of the subjects look different (the spell has no effect on creatures that are not humanoid). Affected creatures can make a Will save to resist. Unwilling targets get a +5 bonus. The spell does not provide the abilities or mannerisms of the chosen form. It does not alter the perceived tactile or audible properties of the subjects.
system.target: One humanoid creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
